basic_info.description: My name is Pedro Alencar, also known as Speedy Dev. I am currently a Computer Engineering student at UFMS and a Mobile Developer at Mega Júnior, working with Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, alongside frameworks such as Django and Flutter.

projects.title: Unisaúde
projects.description: Actively participated as one of the developers of the Unisaúde app for the UFMS University Hospital, using Flutter. This project enhanced my skills in mobile development and teamwork.

projects.title: ATERMS Update
projects.description: I initiated the project to update the obsolete AGRAER website to modern technologies, migrating from Classic ASP to Python. I was responsible for planning the initial stages, utilizing Django as the framework. The application has not been completed and is still undergoing testing with the current developers; its repository is closed to the public due to the sensitive data of the servers contained within.
